artist: Artist: Joel Janowitz; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: Monoprint combining five color bleed printed lithographically using split­fount inking from three plates on okawara paper and monotyping by the artist. The print was then adhered to the Arches Cover backing sheet. Being a variant edition, the prints were signed with Roman numerals I/XII -XII/XII. Number XI/XII image size is 39 1/2 x 20 in. and the backing sheet is 43 x 23 in.
image_copyright: Copyright © Joel Janowitz%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LL in pencil below image: X/XII | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LL below image: HP
medium: Color lithograph and monotype, with chine collé
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2006.
signed: LR in pencil below image: Janowitz 2005 | BC in pencil below image: SCROLL
title: Scroll (X)
